campaign.story:
All Products
Quick, how many d4s in a Superior Healing Potion? Which is larger, Superior or Supreme? You might know (+1 to your Medicine stat if you do), but you likely have players or DMs who don’t, and with everything else to keep track of while playing D&D, any way to avoid slowing down the battle to hit the Index of the Handbook and hunt down the modifier is a positive for everybody playing. 
The Healer’s Kit solves all that. Next time the halfling is stepped on by a giant, the dwarf gets surprised by a mimic, or the druid jumps off a cliff for funsies ending up crumpled in gore on the rocks, you’ll be ready. Simply flip the latch on the box, admire the handiwork, select the proper size potion for the occasion, unscrew the cap, and dump the dice onto the opened lid, it’s also a rolling surface! Add the dice numbers and the right modifier (provided on the underside of the lid) to reveal just how many or few Hit Points you’re getting back.
My goal here is to provide the easiest to use, most glorious potions for everyone. How is that going to happen?
Bottles that LOOK like potion vials!  Some stylish adornments will be on the bottle but not enough to obscure those handsome dice.
Matching red d4 dice! It’s actually quite hard to get matching d4s, and you’ll have enough to make any potion with d4 dice you might need.
Professional designs. The ones on the prototypes are ok, but Amber (the most excellent artist) will do way, way better than me!
Underside of the the lid will be leather, allowing it to double as a dice rolling area!
The leather of the rolling area will also have the potion requirements etched in, so you’ll never have to crack a handbook for that info again.
The foam holds everything neatly in place and perfectly spaced, making it easy to keep the potions ordered how you like them.
5 Box finish options: Unfinished - Dark colored etch (great for darker stains), Unfinished - Light brown colored etch (great for lighter colored stains), Natural with clear coat, Colonial Maple, and Sedona Red.
Two suede leather color options for rolling area: Brown and Tan OR a Druid Friendly option of Cork Wood
Product Pictures
*NOTE* : Artwork and product isn't final. I have budgeted to pay a professional graphics designer to make amazing artwork for all of this. It will only get better :) . The pictures with corked bottles is the latest. 
  Professional Healers Kit - $80
    Available Finishings for Pro Kits
  26 Dice up close
  Starter Vial - $15
  Basic Healer's Kit - $25
BackerKit 
We will use BackerKit after the campaign ends to let you configure your choices!
We've partnered with BackerKit to help ensure you get exactly what you want. With their expert help and great tools, you can feel confident you'll get exactly what you meant to!
Stretch Goals
$17,500 Stretch Goal - Keychain Colors available as a choice
  $20,000 Stretch Goal - Matching Dice Tower
    $30,000 Stretch Goal - Red Mahogany stain with golden artwork
$17,500 - Unlocked - Keychain color is now a backer choice instead of randomized
$20,000 - Unlocked- Free matching dice tower for each Pro kit. It will be easily assembled and disassembled and attach to the rolling surface side of the Pro kits. 
$30,000 - UnLocked - New design that works well with gold or silver foil and unlocks an additional, very dark red stain, Red Mahogany. The foil looks awesome, but requires a completely different approach to how the artwork will be made, and is one of the few things that shows up well with the stains that are really dark. 
$40,000 - Unlocked! - 1 new suede leather color! (Update coming soon)
5,000 vials sold - Locked - Golden Caps for all vials!
Bio
I’ve always been a geek and enjoyed tabletop gaming, and growing up I had heard about d&d but never was around anybody that was playing. It wasn’t until the Geek & Sundry twitch channel launched that I actually got to see it played. My curiosity drove me to watch Critical Role the first day it was broadcast. As I watched the show over the first few months I eventually put in the effort to find a place to play it myself. I’ve since played in a few adventure league groups and really enjoy the opportunities I get to live in another world with friends, doing outlandish and witty things. My passion just keeps growing for this game and I found a way to contribute to the community.
Project History
A Facebook D&D group gave me the idea: labelled glass bottles with the formula and requisite dice for each health potion type in 5th Edition. I ordered the same bottles and remade them myself, getting a more complete idea of how I could improve the labels. The first night’s work boiled down to ramping up the fancy with the stronger potions, having more fun with the filigree, font, and overall presentation. I knew some DMs and players who would want to add this to their toolbox, but wanted to make sure they were ready first.  
To help brainstorm further improvements, I enlisted trusted friend Jared Bouck, who already has successful Kickstarters under his belt. We spent weeks going over options for various aspects. Moving away from glass bottles that break during gameplay to source containers that could take a real beating proved a good idea when one of the glass bottles broke during a game. I also wanted the vials to be part of the experience of a session, to help place the players in their character’s shoes during a tense moment where someone’s hit points are down, and the aesthetics of an apothecary is a great match. It’s not hard to imagine a hardy adventurer walking into a shop, seeing a wooden box with beautiful artwork containing potions, and immediately dropping some hard-earned gold to be ready to heal with style at a moment’s notice. Bringing the box and potions into the real world for everyone to see is an extra treat brought to the table.
Where are the funds going
Most of the funds will be going towards raw materials, purchasing the needed equipment to do this at scale, and a budget for artwork. I'll be purchasing a larger laser engraver and creating a small usable workspace in my garage. All the rest will be used to establish myself as a business that can go forward and keep making awesome Dice Bottle kits in the future. 
Follow us on Kicktraq
  Featured on This is Why I'm Broke
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
My largest risk is supplier delays. The delivery dates chosen have a built-in buffer which should absorb any delays or issues with the suppliers. While all of the companies I am working with are well-established and professional, things happen which can cause unintended delays. My suppliers and I are doing our best to ensure this does not happen.
I have every expectation to meet the deadlines and will provide feedback through kickstarter for each milestone along the way. You'll know when I place my orders, when I expect to receive them, when I actually receive them, how I'm working on processing different items and so on.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content: PLAY

updates.update_userinfo: The Clerics need our help! (Dice Bottles is relaunching)
updates.update_content:
The Clerics need our help!
It is with great sadness that I bring to your attention a realm mirroring our own that is in dire need of the heroic efforts of pauper and duke alike. In this strange realm my magical skills and talents were unusable, and a plague like none I had seen before was ravaging their kingdoms. They have a magic of their own, but the plague was laying claim to more victims and surpassing the constitutions of the realm's considerable army of clerics. They wore a curious armour into battle with the fiend, and it was with horror that I learned why. The plague was invisible to all, and no spell would uncover it. They were forced to fight this invisible villain knowing that if it landed the smallest of blows against them they themselves would be subject to it’s devious curses. Their armor smiths were overtaxed as any armour that was even touched by the enemy became it’s weapon, and would require all armour to be destroyed if any of it were thought to have been cursed. I watched as their wise and fragile were taken, and I am moved to compassion and action on their behalf.
Healing Tokens
Shipped
Another busy weekend with friends helping out!

Busy busy busy
I've made good use of the time I've had the last two weeks. I completed all the foam cutting and cut 3000 vials by hand on my band saw (even broke a blade, now using a spare). This last weekend I had many of my friends over helping me assemble all the parts together and finishing up some remaining tasks.

Missed a week
Sorry about the missed update. The family got sick, included me, and I had to make up some time at my Job. I've still made progress despite that and will detail below.
Leather screen printed

Leather Cutting 
The leather cutters finished far sooner than expected. The good news is I got a little more than expected out of the leather I purchased. The bad news is that I hadn't looked at numbers for a while and there have been so many purchases since I bought the leather that I didn't have enough. Once I got a count, I immediately ordered some more leather and it looks like I'll have the leather next week. The rest are at the silk screener to get the artwork applied.
Some bad news 👿

Tokens all cut and painted!
I spent all weekend running the laser on the tokens. It takes more time to pick up the tokens than it takes to laser and paint them. I finally just started putting them in boxes instead of trying to create individual packs. I'm hoping to get friends to help with grouping them into packs.

100 Boxes protected
I did about 80 with a spray on cans of polyurethane and then did a scratch test and wasn't happy with it. I have since done 100 with triple coat brush on and the art protection is much better from scratches. 
50 boards stained and clear coated

campaign.story:
In the 1st Volume of The Chronicles of FARO, we embarked on a 200 page adventure through time that culminated with the crashing of the Lincoln Assassination. 
We move on to Volume 2, which will open with a very different 1976 and an America that has expanded far beyond Manifest Destiny on it's 200th birthday.
The survival of Lincoln has led to a century of prosperity, but a dark cloud of evil looms in the distance, evolving every day before the eventual convergence of consequences.
 Volume 2 -- Chapter 1 will be a 36 page adventure that will take Faro from the Mississippi River and across the Southwest before touching down in San Francisco for a deadly showdown with Master Wu, who is still seething for revenge since the murder of his true love, the sadistic and seductive Domina Palms.
 With another time machine being built, Faro must choose between the future and the present when his lover Rachel Rain is taken by THE CIRCLE, the cult of trillionaire time travelers who have been stalking Faro since the beginning of this adventure.
As our story continues in a world we can only call American History on Acid, the FARO Series will take your imagination beyond the borders and into new possibilities of story and seduction.
As always Faro Comics not only brings you the best stories, we have the best artists, who bring the ultimate mature mashups to life. 
 Our current print series REIGN of MARVELS constantly sell right out of our gallery. Choose any prints you want with our numerous packages. 
 My goal as a comic book writer is to write for the big boys, but I've been accused of being "too pushy" and "out there" with my ideas each time I get in front of them.  
I always told them I'm not going away, and with your continued support as readers and collectors we continue to be a tiny thorn in the face of corporate comic cliffhanger complacency.
Join the Faro Comics Universe, where the readers get to help create the new posters with your passionate and perverse feedback.
I tell everyone I meet that FARO is the greatest adventure story ever written.  So if you want the chance to call me an arrogant asshole then pick up a copy and tell me I'm wrong.
 I have a body of scars, and scars of bodies in my wake from 20 years of working in the industry of rare and exotic art acquisitions.
It has been the greatest and most stressful moments that make for the true nature of the stories you will read from us.
I hope you love reading it as much as I love writing it.
Thanks for making it this far and always remember,
It doesn't matter where you're going,
It doesn't matter where you've been, 
All that matters
is now.....

support.title: SLAVE DIANA PRINCE
support.descp: From the Manila Branch of Faro Comics -- The SLAVE LEIA TRIBUTE SERIES continues in our series of BLANK COVER COMMISSIONS where we get the greatest gals in comics and get them in the STEEL BIKINI. This is Jedi Joy as its darkest. We have done Black Widow, Scarlet Witch, Gamora, Rey, Darth Talon and Ashoka. This version will be for DIANA PRINCE aka WONDER WOMAN. Done in beautiful painted watercolor by Emil Cabaltierra and shipped in a protective toploader. Reward includes THE REIGN OF MARVELS COMBO PACK. Shipped in protective top loaders.

support.title: STRIP POKER -- SAVAGE ANIMAL
support.descp: From Miami -- 10 games already played in this series of commissions where we choose one sexy member from each respective cinematic universe. We sold our 1st game with Harley, Jean & Natasha and we SOLD both the Battle of the Blondes (Emma, Carol and Kara) and the Battle of the Brunettes (Rogue, Wanda and Diana). campaign.story:
ABOUT THE PROJECT.
PITY PARTY, a dark comedy short about a Pastor with a sordid past trying to give back to the community that saved him by forming a peer support group. He discovers that wanting to help his misbegotten collection of narcissists, militants, sadists, and underachievers is a far cry from actually helping them. Can Pastor Bill get through to them, or will their struggles resurrect his own? Here’s a chance to laugh at other people’s pain. Misery loves company, and this support group has plenty. NOTE: This short has a complete narrative arc (beginning, middle and end) it will also serve as a 'proof of concept' piece for a feature length story with the same cast/characters. You could possibly help make two movies with one pledge. How AWESOME is that?!
YOUR DONATIONS.
Thanks to Producers, Don Walker and Joe Burns, we have an amazing cast and crew who love this project and are willing to sacrifice in the short term to make it happen. Your pledges will predominantly go to SET DRESSING, COSTUMING, CATERING, and your REWARDS. The key to any movie shoot is FEED your cast and crew and make them LOOK GOOD! On a short, that’s easier, and cheaper to do.
THE CAST AND CREW.
Jack E. Curenton (PASTOR BILL).
http://www.imdb.com/name/nm2930463/
Jack E. Curenton is an actor and producer, known for Star Wars: Generations (2016) which recently won the SPIRIT of FANDOM award at this years Star Wars Celebration London, Natural Born Filmmakers (2016) and Super 35 (2012).
Pastor Bill battles his own personal demons while trying, in vain, to reach a motley group determined to wallow in their own personal issues.
Victoria Anne Greenwood (APRIL).
http://www.imdb.com/name/nm3892102/?ref_=fn_nm_nm_1
Victoria Greenwood was born in North Hollywood, California at Valley Presbyterian Hospital, to Sheila Lussier and Marc Greenwood. Her mother is an actress, writer, and documentarian. Her father Marc is a drummer, and the son of country singer songwriter Lee Greenwood.When Victoria was just six month old, she booked her first modeling job. At the age of 5, Victoria appeared in her first television series, "Days of Our Lives". Growing up in the industry, she has been trained by various people. Notably so, by casting director, Geno Havens (The Jerk, More American Graffiti, etc...). From 2004-2006 she had a life altering experience, helping her Mother, as a production assistant, on a documentary about the "Godfather of Soul," James Brown, and his Wife, "Life on the Road with Mr. And Mrs. Brown." In 2010 she was awarded Miss Encino USA and competed in Miss California USA. She attended Santa Monica College studying theater, with an emphasis on historical styles, receiving her AA degree. After turning down the option to continue her studies at UC Berkeley, she has been apart of various plays, showcases, and films. APRIL, star of such classics as Mecha Goblin, and Gecko Knight Vs. Pirahna Bear, is Jackie’s negligibly older sister. Her spate of success as a B-movie queen has only further reinforced Jackie’s feelings of inadequacy. It doesn’t help that April is your classic 'button pusher.' She likes to get a rise out of people. While all in good fun, she's viewed by the group as someone who's not taking this too seriously, because she's not. She's only here as “moral support” for her down and out sister, Jackie.
Alexa Najera (JACKIE).
http://www.imdb.com/name/nm4901064/?ref_=fn_nm_nm_1
Alexa Najera is an actress, known for Blondie (2014), Five (2011) and Nowhereland (2017). JACKIE, has enjoyed an unremarkable tenure during her three years in Los Angeles. While her sister, April, revels in her rising star status, Jackie was just fired from her sixth crappy job. (Also, as April is more than happy to point out, she hasn't been laid in two years.) It's hard enough finding your way in life, but doing so while living with the most confident woman in the world, who also happens to be your sister, doesn't make it any easier. She's hoping the group helps her find meaning, before April gets them both thrown out.

 Marco Garcia-Ballare (FRANK).
http://www.imdb.com/name/nm4659907/
Marco Ballare is known for his work on Gun Woman (2014), A DIsh Best Served (2015) and Tengo Miedo (2011).Marco Ballare is known for his work on Gun Woman (2014), A DIsh Best Served (2015) and Tengo Miedo (2011).
Frank is a cop with a history of shooting black men. Is he a racist, or just doing his job? Or, maybe, there’s more to it than that?
Ashlyn McCormick (TIERANEY).
http://www.imdb.com/name/nm7290086/?ref_=fn_nm_nm_4
Ashlyn McCormick is an actress, known for 427 (2015) and Back Stabber (2016). Tieraney, along with her boyfriend Phillip, are here because of a court order. Unfortunately, the court can only mandate her presence, and she remains stoic in her silence. But, this silence speaks volumes. What is this seemingly normal suburbanite behind those stormy eyes.
Vanard Payne (PHILLIP).
http://www.imdb.com/name/nm4785629/?ref_=fn_nm_nm_1
Vanard Payne is an actor, known for OakTowne (2013), What Else Were You Expecting (2012) and Discarded (2013). Tieraney’s long-time boyfriend, and self-styled protector, Phillip is sharp, witty, and well dressed. But, his southern manners hide something more sinister that only Tieraney can bring it to light.
Logan Davis (DANA).
Logan Davis is an actress, known for Midnight Snack, Theory of Flying, Cat Poop and Buyer Beware.
A happy go lucky skater girl, Dana, and her family, attend Pastor Bill's church. Dana, also happens to like girls, but, she’s got better things to do than shout it out from the rooftops. Mistaking her awkward teen shyness for fear, and desperate to “support” their daughter, Dana’s parents signed her up for Pastor Bill’s group. They hope, with the group’s help, Dana will feel comfortable enough to “come out of the closet”. But, Dana isn’t really worried about it, until she meets April. After that, all bets may be off.

Don Walker (Producer / Director / Writer)  http://www.imdb.com/name/nm4712191/?ref_=fn_nm_nm_22
Don is a filmmaker living in the South Bay of Southern California with his wife and daughter. He has one feature film to his credit, Running from WISHconsin (presently finalizing it's sound design ahead of festival season). http://www.imdb.com/title/tt2076927/?ref_=fn_tt_tt_1
Watch the rough cut of Running from WISHconsin for FREE, here: http://www.veoh.com/watch/v95405414H95N42zA
Don also publishes comic books that he creates, writes and illustrates under his Dork Empire Ink banner and has successfully kickstarted two books, AGENT: WILD #0 (2014) and REAPER CORPS #0 (2016).
Joe Burns (Producer, Unit Production Manager) http://www.imdb.com/name/nm2422356/
Joe has over fifteen productions under his belt in various capacities including Producing, Directing, Writing and Production Design and is best known for School's Out (2016), My Step Daughter (2015), Asian School Girls (2014) and Alpha House (2014). Jarrett Sexton (Director of Photography) http://www.imdb.com/name/nm2369683/?ref_=fn_nm_nm_1
Jarrett is known for the films; Bella (2016), Lost Angels (2014), First (2013) and The Wheels Keep On Turning (2013).
Risks and challenges.
I've successfully funded two projects on Kickstarter. The second went far smother than the first because I learned from my mistakes. On this project, we're mitigating many of the risks by keeping our rewards limited to thing easily produced at a relatively modest cost. Also, this is a short, roughly 15 minute movie with a cast and crew volunteering most of their time because of their love of the material. That's keeping costs way down and making it easier to put your pledges 'on the screen.'
Pre-production, production and post production planning is complete. We simply need the modest financial push listed as the goal for this campaign. Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Let me first express how sorry I am for not keeping up with you all via updates.
This Fall and now winter have been a stressful one as my wife went in for neck surgery in October and I've spent most of my time taking care of her and my daughter. As she's the bread winner of the family, her lack of income has had the negative effect in that I've had to put everything on hold (the rewards that is. Your money went to film production).
Thankfully her recovery is going great and she should be back to work in January 2017 and I'll be back to getting the rewards made and shipped.

The movie is done and I'll be uploading it to the web this weekend for everyone. Physical rewards will go out within the next four weeks.
Thank you all,
Don

Going to the editor this Saturday. Done prep so It's possible the whole flick will be done this weekend. If so, I'll have the movie online for the view only link reward in a few days.
Disk/physical rewards will follow shortly after.
Thank you all for your patience.
Don
THAT'S A WRAP. FOLKS!!

So far so good.
Thank you everyone for supporting the project thus far.
If you could please share the campaign with friends and like minded people it would be greatly appreciated. Right now over 90%+ of the views of this project have been via kickstarter. We really need to broaden the base of support. I will be working tirelessly on doing just that over the next 18 days.

campaign.story:
You saw Level 1. You saw Level 2. Now it's your chance to play Level 3...
We have been overwhelmed by the support shown for Level 1, and have taken things to a whole new level (both literally and figuratively) in our most recent episode - moving from zombies in our back yard to creating an alien spaceship in an abandoned power station
With Level 3, we won't just step up the production value, but also hugely increase the levels of interactivity. All of our backers will be given an account at RLFPS.com which gives you access to behind the scenes and voting rights in pre-production, and the opportunity to join the community in controlling the interactive live prologue to Level 3. Furthermore, rather than finding players on ChatRoulette, our 50 final players for Level 3 will be randomly selected from our backers! 
We're crowdfunding here on Kickstarter, and on our own website to raise the funds to create Level 3. Whichever way you choose to support us, the money will go to the same place and you will receive access to the same content and privileges.
If you don't want to pledge then just sit back and wait - you'll still be able to watch the Level 3 video on YouTube just like you've watched Levels 1 and 2.
 Level 1
 Level 2
 Since Level 1, all we have heard is ‘How can I play?’ and ‘We want to put this on VOD’, but nothing was a good fit. Then it struck us - through crowdfunding we have found a way to keep it on YouTube, keep it free to watch AND allow people to play. So, starting with Level 3, it’s no longer a prank on the internet, it’s no longer random strangers on ChatRoulette - we are going to build a community.
Your £1 pledge won’t just give you the chance to be chosen to play Level 3, it will also give you access to an account at RLFPS.com where you can become part of our creative community, with exclusive behind the scenes access, and voting rights on pre-production.
You’ll get to collectively choose anything from character names, to costume designs, to setpieces - when our props team come up with designs for a new weapon, you will be able to vote on which design goes into production and gets built!
You all come together for a massive playable live stream of the prologue to Level 3 - this is where it gets really cool…
From Level 3 onwards we are doing away with the genre-hopping and creating a consistent universe - so you will follow the characters and the plot across multiple levels of the game. The story picks up right where we left off in Level 2 - with you and the other survivor piloting the escape pod.
The prologue for Level 3 will be broadcast live, and controlled by the voting of all of our backers simultaneously, just like ‘Twitch does Pokemon’ - except with the actors reacting live to the results of all of your choices. You’re in charge of staying alive, and trying to find somewhere to land the escape pod - all of your decisions will have repercussions that will echo across Level 3 and way beyond.
Once the prologue is finished, it’s time for us to start playing the full level - and instead of going to ChatRoulette this time, we’ll be selecting 50 players, at random, from all of our backers. Each of the chosen players will play through the five chapters of Level 3 - as long as they make it through alive…
If you aren’t picked for the full game, you’ll still be able to watch the events unfold. We will be live streaming from the webcam of each player as they face the challenges, but you won’t see what they see - to keep everything spoiler free!
To keep the game as interactive as possible each account on RLFPS.com will be granted a number of tokens which can be gifted to a player during their stream - similar to the ‘sponsors’ in The Hunger Games. If you are rooting for one of the players, or perhaps you even know one of them, gifting them a token when they need it most will give them a game specific boost and help them along.
If you choose to donate more than £1, your name will be entered into the hat multiple times, increasing your chances of being chosen to play Level 3, but no matter what your donation amount you will have access to all of the exclusive online content.
Can't use Kickstarter? Visit our site to pledge via Paypal
 We would love to tell you all about what we have in store for you for level 3 - we’re bursting at the seams to let you in on the surprise - but we’re just not gonna spoil it. Here is what we can say….
No more genre-hopping from zombies to aliens and so on - we now have an opportunity to invite you into a vivid, consistent universe with characters and storylines that span multiple installments. We anticipate that the full game will take up to one hour to complete per player, broken up into shorter chapters, probably five 12 minute sections.
Now that the end goal isn’t a YouTube viral film, the gameplay can slow right down to give you a chance to really explore the world and your options. There will be a heavy focus on interacting directly with other characters and actors in the game, rather than just talking to the guy in the helmet. If you have a great idea for how to solve a problem, convince them to help you.
Budget allowing, there will be much more interaction that just voice - there are so many new things being developed here, it will leave Levels 1 and 2 in the dust.
The team here are more fired up than they have been in years - and we are ready to deliver a rich, living world for you to explore and interact with. We have the best Artificial Intelligence in the industry - because it’s not artificial - there are a dozen real people reacting to each of your decisions in as you make them.
Ultimately the world we can build for you in Level 3 is determined by the number of backers - but trust us when we say, there is a $10m version of Level 3 that would change the face of gaming. The sky really is the limit, and of course anything we don’t get to do with Level 3 will be carried over to Level 4 and beyond.
Realm is about breaking the rules, and combining cinematic production value with high-concepts on a low budget. It's the unforgettable ideas and stories that get us out of bed in the mornings, and the resourcefulness we have picked up over a decade of indie filmmaking that allows us to pull it all off.
 From the moment we came up with the concept for Level 1, it was clear that our friends at Red House Mysteries would be the perfect collaborators for the RLFPS concept. Their experience in creating immersive narrative experiences and passion for innovative storytelling makes them the ideal partner for a project this ambitious.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are well aware that this is an exceptionally ambitious project, pushing the boundaries of technology and interactive gaming and attempting something that has never quite been done before. 

Here at Realm we have a decade of filmmaking experience behind us, and with the highly skilled team that delivered Levels 1 and 2 coming together again to create Level 3 we are confident that we have the capacity to solve any problems that may arise during production

campaign.story:
Who are we?
We are Skull & Chili Review.  We love hot sauces, salsa, BBQ sauces, and chili peppers. We review various products ever week and let you know what we think.  We have tons of fun trying new sauces that many have never heard or seen as well as give people a bit of comedy as we suffer through some of the hottest peppers on the planet.  We are doing really well right now with getting our videos out every Sunday but we have this dream of taking our show on the road and going live doing reviews.
Our goal.
What we are wanting to do is to get the equipment needed to actually be able to produce a live show and on location. We have a list of the items we need in order to accomplish this and our funding goal reflects these items. We are also looking at being able to use the items listed for live broadcasts of our show at various locations all while doing reviews.
Here is our list of the items that we are going to purchase if our goal is met.
1 - LimoStudio Photo Video Studio Light Kit
1 - Morros Shoulder Mount Rig/Stabilizer Support System
2 - Behringer Ultravoice XM8500 Microphones
1 - TASCAM DR-60DmkII Audio Recorder
1 - Canon GL2 MiniDV 3CCD Camcorder
1 - Livestream device. 
We want to be pretty transparent when it comes to what we are looking at purchasing. 
Videos of our reviews.
Here are a couple of videos of some of our reviews that we do so that you all can have an idea about why we have a Kickstarter for new equipment.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There really are no risks involved for any of our backers. If everything works out and our goal is met, then we will start getting everything out ASAP to our backers. Thank you all for taking a moment to check it out and we hope you all take a chance on S&C Review.

campaign.story:
Short Summary
We are a bunch of geeks who love comics, games, movies, cosplay, conventions, and pretty much anything else that makes us a geek. With that being said, we want to share our passion with the world and get some great conversations, debates and just all around fun to our fellow geeks out there.
We are pretty committed to getting this thing going. We have already purchased and setup our website to broadcast from, we have several interviews currently lined up with cosplayers, comic book artists, and convention throwers. We are just looking for that extra help from our fellow geeks to bring this to life and make it something we all know it can be.
To give you an idea of the kind of things we have planned for this venture, we are going to be doing some live broadcasts from various Cons that we will be attending, both via live video as well as through broadcasting via our station. This is a great way to hear from some of the amazing artists and cosplayers that make up a good part of why we go to conventions.
This is a dream that we know will come true and we want you to be a part of it. So if you can, show some support for this great project.
What Need:
Video Mixer with broadcasting capabilities.
This is where the money will be going.  This is the budget that we figured will get us what we need.  We are throwing in some cash on our end as well.  This extra funding will put us right were we need to get the mixer that will bring our live broadcasts to you via video and internet radio.
What you get:
We aren't asking for a whole lot, but you will get some great things in return for your pledge.
At the $1 reward -
You get a shout out on both our site and on air.
For the $5 reward -
You get the shoutouts and you get an exclusive BAM! Geek Radio vinyl sticker.
At the $25 reward -
You can get a BAM! Geek Radio Shirt.
Sizes are small, medium, large and X-large.
The Impact
Here at BAM! we feel that there really isn't a station or place anymore that is geeky. We have seen videos and a couple of podcasts that were entertaining but nothing that really stood out as being straight up news and information that impacts us geeks. We also want to bring a bit of geek into everyone's home, car, and workplace.
This is something that we feel very passionate about and we hope you do to. We live by these following words:
"Do. Or do not. There is no try." Other Ways You Can Help If you want to help in other ways such as spreading the word about BAM! Geek Radio, then hit us up once this thing catches on. We will be happy to have you be a part of something geeky.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are really no risks. If we don't get the funding, we move on and try again. If we do get this funding, then everyone who backs will have our undying love, respect, and our MTG cards...ok, we don't have alot anymore but we will be glad to share some with you all.

campaign.story:
Most fruits and vegetables need air circulation as they ripen. A wooden bin that allows air flow, and keeps your food up off of the counter or shelf makes an ideal storage container.
2 tier and 3 tier produce bins
I had a habit of putting the plastic bags of produce in one corner of the kitchen counter. Aside from trapping the off-gassing, the plastic bags also made it difficult to see what was there. I built a small double basket using some scrap wood, and decided it was appealing enough to make an offering of it.
Original bin, built to fill a need
My goal is to raise enough funds to purchase several better quality power tools, so that I can continue with various experimental furniture designs.
Both bins are made of Pine or Spruce (the standard "whitewood" from local home center), and are unfinished. 
In addition to produce storage, they are also very useful in closets, bathrooms, and laundry rooms.
All sponsor levels include the cost of shipping within the US (the plans will be emailed). For those outside the US, I recommend the plans. The plans are simple enough that if you don't have the tools, you should be able to find a woodworker in your area that can build it cost effectively.
DIY plans - $4 sponsor
The plans will include 6 different variations. In addition to the 2 main designs on this project, you will also receive plans for similar projects using stock lumber sizes, so no ripping of lumber is necessary. Another plan will detail a 4 bin unit, and a final one will be intended for hardwood that can be purchased in small trim sizes.
Each plan will include a SketchUp file in addition to the PDF diagrams. The SketchUp program is a simple 3D rendering program that has a limited free version available, so you can open the files and rotate around the objects, pull them apart, and make your own modifications.
2 Tier DIY kit - $27 sponsor
The 2 tier DIY kit includes all of the wood pieces needed to build the 2 tier unit, cut to size. You will need clamps, glue, and preferably a brad nailer that can handle 5/8" brads. Alternatively, if you don't have a brad nailer you could use screws on a couple of the critical pieces, and just glue on the rest.
Kit pieces for the 2 tier bin
The kit also includes a simple jig to help with assembly. The jig makes it much easier to get everything assembled square.
Dimensions of the 2 tier bin
3 Tier DIY kit - $35 sponsor
This kit is similar to the 2 tier kit, but with longer legs and the extra pieces for 3 tiers. It also ships unfinished, requires glue, clamps and a brad nailer, and instructions will be emailed.
Jig for assembling DIY bins
This kit also includes the assembly jig. The jig makes it much easier to get everything assembled square, as well as mark the legs at the proper points.
Dimensions of the 3 tier bin
2 Tier Bin - $56 sponsor
The 2 tier bin is 13.25" tall. It is identical to the lower 2 shelves of the triple bin. It ships fully assembled.
2 Tier Bin
Sponsor price includes shipping in the US.
3 Tier Bin - $68 sponsor
The 3 tier bin measures 21" tall, 12.75" wide, and 11.25" deep. It ships fully assembled. 
3 tier bin
As above, sponsor price includes shipping within the US.

campaign.story:
PLAY

Are you troubled by strange noises in the middle of the night? Do you experience feelings of dread in your basement or attic? Have you or your family ever seen a spook, spectre, or ghost? If the answer is "yes," then don't wait another minute. Pick up the phone and call the professionals . .
Ghostbusters: The Board Game is an episodic adventure game for one to four players, who are charged with busting ghosts and sealing gates to the Spirit World. The game is customizable, cooperative, and highly re-playable. It features unique illustrations and figures based on original artwork and designs by Dan Schoening, the artist of IDW's Ghostbusters comic book series. Each Ghostbuster has a distinct role and unlocks unique abilities by gaining experience. The game offers modes for different levels of players, making it accessible to beginners and challenging to experts. Now is your chance to save the world!
Ghostbusters TM & © 2015 Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc.  All Rights Reserved.
• Box Dimensions: 12.125"W x 12.125"H x 4"D
• 48 Custom 32-50mm Plastic Mini Figures
• 10 Double-Sided 5.5" x 5.5" Game Board Tiles
• 6 Dice (5 D6 & 1 D8)
• 43 Tokens (Streams, Slimes, Gates, XP Trackers)
• 1 PKE Meter
• 4 Player Cards (4"H x 6"W)
• 6 Ghost Cards (4"H x 3"W)
• 1 Ghostbusters Operations & Field Manual
The Paranormal level pledge will get you the base game box, along with all applicable stretch goals unlocked during the campaign.
Includes upgraded Ecto-1 and upgraded 100mm Stay Puft Marshmallow Man
The Mass Hysteria level pledge will get you the deluxe game box featuring Kickstarter-exclusive packaging with foil stamping, exclusive 12" x 12" giclée print, exclusive glow-in-the-dark dice, 4 exclusive double-sided game board tiles, exclusive Sandman boss figure and ghost card, exclusive "Impossible Mode" angry, super-sized Stay Puft Marshmallow Man boss figure and ghost card, and additional scenarios, plus all applicable stretch goals.
Includes upgraded Ecto-1 and upgraded 100mm Stay Puft Marshmallow Man
The Retailer level pledge is for verified retailers ONLY. We will message you to verify your sales license and store info. If we cannot verify your retailer status, we WILL refund your pledge. You get 6 copies of the base game box, 6 retailer-exclusive glow-in-the-dark Slimer figures, plus 6 copies of all applicable stretch goals.  
Includes upgraded Ecto-1 and upgraded 100mm Stay Puft Marshmallow Man

Ghost Cards
Here's a look at some of the Ghost Cards. Take a look at how they react when hit or missed and all of the things that differentiate them from each other.
The Grey Lady may be shy, but she's not afraid to stop your roughhousing in its tracks. If this librarian has paid your scenario a visit, she won't go quietly! If you do manage to get her attention, she leaves you only with your thoughts, waiting to cramp your style in the next adventure! The Grey Lady will add a challenge to many scenarios, especially if playing more than one in a single session. 
Sandman will include a custom scenario specifically designed for him.
Zombie Taxi Drivers are eager to take the Ecto-1 on a joy ride around town! Once one of them reaches your ride, he immobilizes it until you get rid of him, but not until he sends it speeding off, ghost rider style!
The Zombie Taxi Drivers will come with a scenario specifically designed for them. However, they can also be used as Class 1 replacements and companions in base game scenarios. 
Note: When differently named Ghosts share a Class, roll a d6 for each, with the higher roll making an appearance. Impossible Mode versions get +3 to this roll!
Player Cards
Up to 4 players take on the roles of the Ghostbusters and attempt to return balance between the Spirit World and ours, busting ghosts and sealing the gates from which they’re invading. Completing a scenario requires teamwork, planning, and resourcefulness.  
Melanie Ortiz keeps a watchful eye on her coworkers, and a closer eye on her targets. Her selfless acts bring her closer to knowing herself, and in turn, in how to deal with the approaching end game of the other worldly intruders.
Janine’s quick response time is her key attribute at the front desk and as a Ghostbuster! When she spots a newly summoned Ghost, she acts fast, and when she sees a fellow Ghostbuster in a tight situation, she leaps into action!
Kylie thinks things through, to the point where she anticipates what's coming! Her research into the forbidden arts has granted her insight into the dark intentions of her enemies, whose actions seem entirely random to everyone else.
Ron is always trying to prove he has the chops to be a better Ghostbuster, even if that means putting himself in danger. He's no schlub when it comes to tech and the closer he gets to a threat, the more brazen he becomes.
Peter Venkman is a risk-taker who does his best work in close proximity to ghosts.
Illustrated by Dan Schoening, sculpted by Samuel H. Greenwell
Ray Stantz excels at removing slime from his fellow Ghostbusters.
Illustrated by Dan Schoening, sculpted by Samuel H. Greenwell
Egon Spengler is a wild man with his proton pack, but learns from his mistakes.
Illustrated by Dan Schoening, sculpted by Samuel H. Greenwell
Winston Zeddemore aids the team by being the best at depositing trapped ghosts.
Illustrated by Dan Schoening, sculpted by Samuel H. Greenwell
Featured ghosts from the movies, cartoons, comics, and toylines have unique abilities as well, in terms of how they move and react to your actions.
The game features 3 campaigns, each with 4 unique scenarios. It’s a fast-paced game: each scenario takes approximately 30 intense minutes to play. Every campaign concludes with an epic battle against an iconic boss character.
The game uses dice to resolve a lot of the action, so it’s never the same game twice! The three types of dice represent the proton packs and ghost traps, the unpredictable movements of the ghosts, and the chaotic activity of the gates. During each turn, players move, shoot proton streams, deposit trapped ghosts, use unique character abilities, and drive the Ecto-1 to complete objectives. 
Each scenario’s map is constructed using double-sided tiles, featuring street and park imagery by the talented Robb Mommaerts. With a starter mode and a challenge mode, Ghostbusters: The Board Game will keep you enthralled for hours!
Here is a link to a Rules Primer to give you a bit of insight into specific scenario gameplay!  https://bit.ly/1vGYVAl
Here is an introductory video that goes through the basic elements of the game!
PLAY

The video below features a full playthrough of one of our several introductory scenarios! 
And if that wasn’t enough, here is Part 2 of the playthrough!
To create the best game possible, we’ve collaborated with some incredible people: game designers, avid game players, and Ghostbusters fans. This project is on Kickstarter because we want to make this game extra special for you. We want to provide you many ways to customize your experience with a selection of cool add-ons and Kickstarter exclusives you can't get anywhere else, including a snazzier version of the game box design. And we can’t wait to announce some of the amazing stretch goals! Basically, you get the version of the game you want, and you get it before anyone else.

campaign.story:
“SCAPULA is the World’s Worst Villain…and I do mean the WORST. A frustrated grouch in a spooky skeleton costume, Scapula fights an ongoing battle to prove his worth as a supervillain. To do that he’ll have to stake his claim in the underworld, competing with crazed creeps, monsters, gangsters, and other sick minds. The worst has only just begun!”
Greetings, creepy comic-lovers! My name is Aidan Casserly. Scapula is my creator-owned series; first self-published in 2007, Scapula made the leap to webcomics the following year and has been continuously updated ever since.
For the sixth anniversary of the webcomic, I am releasing SCAPULA: WORLD’S WORST VILLAIN, the largest and finest book collection in the series. It is both a perfect introduction to new Scapula readers and a creative highlight to longtime fans.
 ...and it just gets weirder...!
I wish to produce a larger book-run than any of my previous volumes, with a finer quality printing and more extras to reward everyone’s generosity. The larger book run will allow me to sell SCAPULA: WORLD’S WORST VILLAIN at conventions and bookstores, making the series available to a greater audience than ever before!
What is contained in this villainous volume?
-The Series: Collecting six complete and sequential storylines of Scapula comics, beginning from the series’ relaunch. A major bonus is that all of the daily strips appear in color for the first time ever!!!
-The Halloween Gang Class of 2014: A ‘class picture’ spread profiling the punk kids in Scapula’s army, along with a special bonus: Kickstarter supporters who donate at a certain rewards level will be caricatured as members of the gang!
-Best of the Patreon Comics: Special comics from DADAMAN, a limited series created just for hardcore Scapula-supporters!
-Extended Character Profiles: Everything you ever wanted to know, or were just morbidly curious about, the creepy cast of this comic. Worthy of Wikipedia, but with lotsa' pretty pictures!
-How to Ruin Comics the ‘Scapula’ Way: A special behind-the-scenes chapter, revealing the complete process of creating the comics!
Like the book? Here are the awesome bonus rewards you can get for just a wee bit more!
UPDATE: Thanks to you all of our amazing backers, we have met our goal! But why end the party now when there are snazzy Stretch Goals to be achieved?
THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT, FELLOW COMIC-LOVERS!
I have enjoyed every moment of creating these characters, stories, art, and lunacy, and I hope that with your help this comic will be able to keep on going for many more years to come. Thank you for your help and keep supporting the Bad Guy!
 SCAPULA: World's Worst Villain will be released by Arsenal Comics & Games Publishing. Arsenal is a publishing imprint that specializes in creator owned comics and tabletop games.

campaign.story:
Titan has survived the threat of The Brain Trust and the power of Legend who was mind-controlled by the malevolent Mindworm!
ORIGIN

Responding to a fire at Advanced Technologies Laboratory, firefighter Marcus Cameron is performing a rescue of laboratory personnel when an experimental device that taps into stellar energies & harnesses the power of the stars explodes.The energies engulf him, sending him into a coma as his body metabolizes the energies that grant him the powers of Titan.
Titan the Ultra Man (Dino Agor Cover)
STORY
Titan is a "flawed" superhero, a regular guy with regular issues and problems, who is struggling to do the right thing with his powers as he navigates the accolades & trappings that come with those powers.  Titan is the most popular man in the world who has the world at his feet - anything he wants is his.  We follow Titan on his journey of redemption and his emergence as a true hero! 
Now the adventures of Titan the Ultra Man continues...
Interior Art from TITAN THE ULTRA MAN #2
That's right folks, this is the first official Advent Comics Kickstarter and we present our strongest hero Titan in issue #2 of his own series to begin with!  Titan first appeared in the very first Advent Comics release in 2009 and was so popular that he was given his own series in 2012.  If you liked Titan the Ultra Man #1, then you will LOVE this one!!
In Issue #2, Titan the Ultra Man returns to tackle the deadly Corporate Raiders but who is the mysterious Porcelain Doll that comes to his aid?  If Titan survives, he still has to face the villainy of Atom Smasher and Mauler!  And we introduce the next BIG thing - the hero Giant!!  We are trying to give you a lot for your support! 
Also, this issue DEBUTS TITAN'S BRAND NEW COSTUME!!  While we loved his old uniform, it received too many comparisons to a character from our Marvelous competition and you can see it in this very issue. 
Dheeraj Verma Cover
We are trying to raise funds that will go to pay for the remainder of the coloring, lettering and printing of the book.  We just need a little more money to get it done.  I have already invested a great deal of money & resources into this project and want people to see what we've done.  The remaining money that we net from this project will be going towards paying for the rewards and Kickstarter/Amazon fees.  If enough is generated we'll be able to pay for Issue #3! Yeah, that's right, issue #3 and beyond will be coming with the SAME creative team if this project is successful.
Interior Art from TITAN THE ULTRA MAN #2
WHO ARE THE CREATORS?!

WRITER/CREATOR: Tony Kittrell - Tony has been a comics fan and creator of his own comics for almost 40 years (yes, he is that old).  After deciding to self publish Advent Comics' Pandemonium: Evil Incarnate in 2009, he has gone on to create/publish Champions of Hope, Advent Comics Spotlight #1, Titan the Ultra Man #1, Darklight & Crew #1, Advent Universe Handbook, COSMOS #1, the upcoming The Regulators (along with art from the awesome Greg LaRocque who has done DC's Flash, Legion of Super Heroes and a ton of other projects) and God Cell: Gate of the Gods (a great story that was a successfully funded Kickstarter and collaboration with three outstanding Indie creators).  Tony has created a dynamic universe and brought forth over 500 characters to populate the Advent Universe! 
INTERIOR ARTIST:  Pow Rodrix - Pow is a dynamic artist whose beautiful pencils have graced the pages of Justice League, Wolverine, Fist of Justice and Lady Death.  His awesome work on Titan #2 is simply gorgeous and will soon have everyone talking about this book!
COLORIST:  Brian "Tots" Valeza - Tots is an extremely talented colorist who I have had the pleasure of working with on a few occasions over the years as "the colorist of choice" for Jimbo Salgado on a couple of Advent Comics projects.  Tots is a highly respected colorist and a staple on DeviantART with his Totmoartsstudio2 page.  Tots is bringing the art to life with his beautiful colors!
LETTERER:  Ed Dukeshire -  What can I say about Ed that has not been said hundreds of times before?!  Ed is a top notch letterer who when asked stepped up to participate on this project (for which I am eternally grateful).  Ed has also worked on Hulk, Irredeemable and Sons of Anarchy.  Ed came from Indie roots as the co-creator of the wildly popular Fist of Justice character and the Digital Webbing site.  His prolific skills round out this creative team quite nicely!
Ken Hunt Cover
Also, there will be works in this project from the following creators:

Pablo Marcos (Avengers, Thor, Detective Comics, Teen Titans)
Bart Sears (Justice League Europe, X-O Manowar, Brutes & Babes)
Ken Hunt (Talon, Godsend)
Dheeraj Verma (Transformers, Escape of the Living Dead)
Eric Battle (Batman, Spider Man, Hardware, Aspen's The Scourge)
Dave Ryan (War of the Independents, Red Anvil Comics)
Mshindo Kuumba (Jaycen Wise & Stormbringers)
Steven "Sash" Scott (Advent Comics Dragon , Dove Magazine)
Dino Agor (Advent Comics Project: Homeland)
Interior Art from TITAN THE ULTRA MAN #2
We hope that you like what you have seen so far and support our project so that we may bring this and other awesome stories to you.
PERKS & REWARDS
We have some awesome perks and rewards for those of you who support our project!
A SPECIAL, NEVER-BEFORE-SEEN, BART SEARS PRODUCED WALLPAPER!!
T-SHIRTS
Version A T-Shirt
Version B T-Shirt
Version C T-Shirt
Version C T-Shirt (Back)
ONE-OF-A-KIND CUSTOM ACTION FIGURE OF TITAN IN HIS FIRST APPEARANCE COSTUME
EXCLUSIVE TITAN STATUE (IN HIS NEW COSTUME) CREATED FOR THIS KICKSTARTER PROJECT
Titan Statue WIP
Here are our stretch goals for this Kickstarter!!
If we hit 100 backers, everyone with a mailable goal/reward will receive this Mshindo Kuumba print.
Mshindo Kuumba Print
If we hit 200 backers, everyone with a mailable goal/reward will receive this Dave Ryan/Bryan Magnaye print.
Dave Ryan/Bryan Magnaye Print
$4000 - If we hit $4,000 everyone who has given us a physical, shippable address will receive a special print from a secret special guest star.  With the talent that we have given you so far, I think you know this one will be awesome as well.
$5000  - If we hit $5,000, we will give all backers the EXCLUSIVE COVER by comics legend Pablo Marcos!
$6,000 - If we hit the $6,000 goal we will completely fund Titan the Ultra Man #3 and send it to everyone who pledged above $20!

"Chris Pyrate is one of those new talents whose impressive work blindsides you out of nowhere from the get go and immediately keeps you wanting more. I absolutely cannot wait for Feral -- and everything to follow." - Joe Keatinge (Shutter, Tech Jacket, Glory)

"Chris is the real deal. He knows where his influences are coming from and he knows how to use them to get his art to somewhere only he can get to. Right now, that place is Feral NYC. After that, who knows? But I can tell you that every place from here to there is somewhere anyone who loves comics should visit." - Greg Matiasevich (Multiversity Comics, Robots from Tomorrow Podcast)

"I was blown away by the first few pages of Feral NYC when I saw them last year and I can't wait to sit down and read the whole thing." - Chris Burnham (Batman Inc., The Amory Wars, Nameless)
Feral NYC #1 Wrap Around Cover by Chris Pyrate

+ 3 BRAND NEW Reward Tiers

1) Illustrated Mini-Survival Guide 

2) Feral'ize your Pet!Have your pet drawn into an issue of Feral NYC! Your pet will get a futuristic, post-apocalyptic makeover and be featured on a page of Feral NYC.
Example of pets drawn by CHris Pyrate (from the Liberator Trade Paperback)
 3) Marvel & DC Sketch Covers
One of the Sketch Covers available.
Choose between Marvel & DC comics and have your favorite character drawn on the front cover!
 What is Feral NYC?
Feral NYC is a post apocalyptic comic that explores a possible future in which we(humans beings) drive ourselves to extinction, leaving behind a world that refuses to wait for our resurrection... or even mourn our loss.

Seen through the eyes of, 7-7, a single reconnaissance droid with a yet unknown origin. The idea is to explore the post-human age/post- metropolitan landscape while recreating the perspective of the old school pbs nature documentaries. 

If I had to elevator pitch it, I'd say:
WALL-E meets Homeward Bound meets PBS Nature Docs...
7-7 Reconnaissance droid and our viewpoint into the post-Human Age, post- metropolitan world of Feral NYC.
Why I need your help?

Simply put, printing isn't cheap and as a full-time, freelance artist; attempting to deliver a high quality comic book can be very time consuming.  Every hour I spend on Feral NYC takes an hour away from my paid work. But over the last year or so I (along with some awesome contributors) have finally developed enough content to collect the first volume.
What's included in the Deluxe Edition?
Back up stories & Pin ups by some of the best creator owned comic artists/writers, that's what!

updates.update_content:
Hey guys and gals, 
Quick update here as im using my phone to get this one out. I've been unintentionally quiet lately and even missed some peoples messages, comments and requests. Not sure how this happened buy I've reached out to those I've missed.
This all happened as I've been trying to navigate a huge move that has been delayed since January... all while doing large-scale mural work in multiple cities. The past 2 months I've lived on the road while working my last mural commitments in the North East. This was not supposed  be the case but a slew of unfortunate events slowed everything down.

First, sorry again for falling behind in updates!

Im steadily prepping & pushing out packages, as I balance my continuously, evolving freelance career. The current tiers going out and/or being prepped are:

1) Un-fine Art Sketchbook (basic) tier- these starting shipping out over a week ago, If you have this tier expect it by the end of the month.

Hey folks,

So I know I’ve been quiet since announcing the new shipping plans on remaining unfulfilled tiers. And yes.. I have yet to announce when exactly this will go into effect. A couple reasons for this(hopefully good ones):
First... I got asked by one of the backers, Carmine Street Comics, to do a mural for the store. I did it and it took a hell of a lot longer and a hell of a lot more out of me, than I planned. But while doing it I contacted several NY-based backers to meet up w/ them while working on it and some were successful but most couldn’t make it due to summer vacations, timing, etc.

Hey folks,

Super sorry for the delayed update! Aside from working on the newly, greenlit Feral series *wipes extra, slimy sweat from forehead*, I've been having some print issues w/ the shirts not coming back in a respectable quality. The amount of colors and level of detail I use is a big hurdle to most print shops it seems... Didn't want to promise dates until I got something I was super confident in giving out.

Hey supporters, I know some of you are still waiting for your packages. I thanks those who have read it and loved it and also those that have patiently waited. So far PDF’s/digital packages have gone out as well as some original art/commission tiers. If you are are one of those backers and haven’t received yours please let me know via message or email( chris@chrispyrate.com)
Otherwise, so much has changed/progressed and I am doing my best to pace everything and multitask. What is going on you ask?? To start, my last 3 weeks have been consumed w/ me negotiating a major publication deal for Feral NYC as an ongoing series. ITS HAPPENING!

Hey peeps,

Always wanted to release Feral NYC on a special day, originally I planned for that day to be New Years but have since had to make some unforeseen, pre-press changes.

Coincidentally, the changes have aligned with another special time, my birthday weekend. So I'm celebrating by releasing the PDF to all backers at the digital book tiers levels & anyone else who wants the early read!

updates.update_userinfo: Major Publication confirmed, Feral will be an ongoing series!! shipping schedule/update.
updates.update_content:
Hey peeps,

Happy to announce that Feral NYC will be going off to the press this coming week. That's right! Go ahead and say it, "Finally". I knowww! But I promise, it looks a million times better thanks to the time and growth I went through while making it.

If you missed the last update, I wrote a blog post detailing all the happenings that went on while making the book. The sometimes crazy and expecting happenings... To be brief, I got the opportunities to work on some high reward jobs that I couldn't turn down(Image Comics, Wu-tang and more). But not all were as successful and efficient as they should of been, hence the unexpected/unfortunate side of things. 's the more detailed account of it all.

In that last update I also announced new FREE extras that will be included in packages as a "thank you" for your patience. Here's the first to arrive, a new batch of buttons showcasing the Hermit Crab in the cola can.

campaign.story:
Demonox is a story about a young man named Mason who finds out that a demon is trying to take over his body and soul. And the only way to stop this demon from taking over is to learn to control the demon and the demon's powers before it's too late.
The Summary
Demon Within in a nut shell is a story explaining what would happen if a person could control a demon who tried to possess their body. It’s about using demon powers like super heroes. Think about it, when people get possessed by demons they do all sort of stuff they naturally can’t do. They levitate, talk in different languages they don’t know, and even pick up heavy objects.
 Demon Within takes the things they can do to another level. Shadow power, fire control power, and animal control power, seducing power, water power, wind power, mind control, invisibility power and a whole lot more.
 The Story
Ultimately the story is about two groups fighting- Demonox (hell) vs. Angelic (heaven); they both want our world (the human world). This is the beginning of the Apocalypse.　 There are two other groups involved in this war. The Church – who kills both Angelic and Demonox, and The Rebels – Helps those who don’t want to take sides but are either a Demonox or Angelic.
The first volume of Demon Within is of a kid who is discovering he is a Demonox. His name is Mason and he has just turned 18 releasing the demon within him. He now has to learn how to control his demon before his demon controls him.
There are other demonox in the world and unfortunately our hero Mason will meet one of them the hard way as he sees his best friend and brother killed before his very eyes making him turn to the demon for help. He does not complete the bond with demon and does not save his brother or his friend but he does injure the demonox responsible named Victor.
Victor then swears revenge on Mason so he kidnaps Mason's little sister. Now Mason must learn to control the demon within to be able to stop Victor before he loses another sibling.
The Reason
First of all thank you for taking the time to show interest in this project. My name is Walter Cromartie Jr. and I love to write stories. I have written over forty or more short stories, all unpublished. I chose to make my stories into comics because comics always seemed like a fun way to express and tell stories.
Anyway I never was a writer who could explain details very well. So doing comics took all the boring stuff out of writing for me and it left only the fun stuff. There’s nothing like seeing words on paper brought to life through art. This whole adventure has been really fun and exciting.
So that leads us to here with Demonox. Demonox is not my first story but it will be the first to become a comic. I chose Demonox because it just was one of the stories that seemed to flow with excitement. It is filled with scary monsters and transformations. It had everything I wanted to see in a comic so I said let’s make it a comic.
Next I got with a great and experienced Artist named Dan MacKinnon who has been one the most incredible people to work with.
He has literally been a mentor to me in this journey. He had just finished a successful Kickstarter for a graphic novel named The Merciful. So I consider myself lucky to have been able to get him to work on this comic for me.
I also consider myself even luckier to have had such a wonderful Inker and Letterer named Becca T-R who did a more than fantastic job with the Inks and Letters.

Message From Artist - Dan MacKinnon
PLAY

The Big Mission
I come to Kickstarter to help us finish Demonox. The script is finished and the comic is a quarter of the way done.
That's where the mission comes in.
Paying Artist
Paying Kickstarter and Amazon
Paying for all rewards
Paying for shipping of rewards
Paying for printing of comic books
Paying Photographer
Paying for Ads for promoting
The mission at hand is to get the story Demonox finished, fully colored and made into a full 32 page comic book. This comic book will be the first issue of the series.
As you can see this project is a big mission. But with your help we can make this project come to become reality.
If we are able to hit the goal all money raised goes to this project, any money over the amount asked will go to funding the next issue of Demonox.
The Storyboard
 The Characters
The Main Character Mason
 Mason must learn to control the Demon within him before the demon controls him.
The Main Villian Victor
 Victor is a Demonox with the powers to control shadows at will.
Mason's best friend Sam
Mason's older brother Michael
Alex is the head fighter for the Rebels group.
Stacey is Mason's girlfriend
Marcello is in command over Victor the Shadow Demonox
Demon Characters
There will be plenty of demons and monster type beasts but here's a few pictures in the first issue.
Some sketches of demons
Leviath the demon within Mason
Early picture of Shadow Demon
Rewards
We will be offering all these rewards
Bookmarks

·PDF Copy of Demonox
·Key Chains
·Exclusive Cover Paper Copy
·Mugs
·Posters
·T-Shirts
·Drawstring Carry Bags

·Original Artwork
·Hats
·Banners
·Autographs
Thank You
 I want to thank you for your time of just reading and going through all the information of this Kickstarter Project. If you don't have money to donate, thank you for sharing with friends and family who may have interest in comics.
And to those who do donate, I want to thank you and let you know you are helping to begin not just a comic book franchise but you are also helping to show that if you have a dream and you believe in it with all your faith, your dream will become reality.
SO THANK YOU FROM THE TOP AND BOTTOM OF MY HEART!
Creator/Writer of Demonox - Demon Within
Walter Cromartie Jr.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are always risks and challenges that will arise when you do projects at this magnitude. But be assure we are ready to hurdle any obstacle that may come. In fact with the date set we have adjusted the delivery date just for any such occasion that may happen. In other words if all goes like plan you should have rewards earlier than later.

All preparations have been made with the companies that will provide the rewards. So now all that is left is to get the funds to fulfill the orders. To make sure you know what’s going on with rewards I will be updating every step. So everything that I know on rewards you will know.

You only will be charged if the Kickstarter is a success. And will give notice for last three days you are about to be charged so you will have time to make sure money is in your account.

campaign.story:
MEMOIRS OF THE MYSTERIOUS is a digital download graphic novel anthology that harkens back to the glory days of The Twilight Zone, The Outer Limits and EC Comics.  
The PDF book is roughly 60 pages full of mystery filled short stories. 
Each story is between 4 to 6 pages long and is introduced by horror host Doctor Gangrene.  Each tale pays tribute to this thrilling genre by weaving narratives ranging from mystery and suspense to strange slice-of-life to horror and sci-fi (and there's always a twist at the end).
By Joe Badon (with inserts by Kelly Williams, Luke Parker and Emman Padilla)
By Luke Parker
By Kelly Williams

project_data.project_name: Memoirs of the Mysterious COMIC ANTHOLOGY

campaign.story:
OK IT's Finally Time to talk about the First STRETCH GOAL!!! If we can reach 6325 $ we will be able to color the 7 pages of our Rifts(tm) Erin Tarn as a Girl short story!!!!!!
1st STRETCH GOAL COMPLETED!!!
Our 2ND STRETCH GOAL will get us 3 extra pages of story for REQUIEM and JUDA FIST:7 Deaths Of The YOBI. It will allow us to tell a more comprehensive story and give a sneak peak at the direction that the proposed series will take. We 7325 bucks to make this a reality!! LET's Make this happen!!!!
We are very excited to be back on Kickstarter drumming up support to help us publish issue number 1 of our comic book anthology IMAGINOS PLUS!!!!!!! 
While we are quite diverse in the mediums we choose to work in ( from writing for short films  to pitching scripts and projects for film and TV, and helping others through the pitch building process) we believe that comics, particularly comics anthologies are the natural progression in showing what a story can do in the visual medium. 
As far back as Gary Reed's Caliber Comics, anthologies and Japanese tankobon (weekly/monthly serialized manga series, for example "Shonen Jump") have helped to launch the careers of some of the biggest creators in comics and manga!
With the first issue of IMAGINOS PLUS we plan to  continue this legacy by giving visionary voices an opportunity to show their mettle on our projects as well as their own creator owned work. 
Imaginos Plus, as planned, will begin as a biannual publication(Spring and Fall). Our first issue has  3 stories at 18 pages, and 4 sketchbook pages showing the ideas from each story at their conceptual stages. We will also have Heroes Unlimited Game Stats for the principle Palladium Books property inspired characters.
To be clear, what we are asking for your help to achieve is the publication of our FIRST ISSUE!
So let's talk about whats going to be in IMAGINOS PLUS ISSUE 1!!!!!
The 1st story in our anthology is the ridiculously funny, over the top,superhero comedy
with art by the illustrious team of Dimitris Moore, Brandon C. Clark and Shauna Grant and writing by Imaginos Workshop. 
There are Superheros and there are THESE GUYS ......
The alien police officers Skittles and the diminutive Commander Q, the world-hopping Meta mercenary Siege, the super powerful and woefully disinterested mutant Touch Tone, the morally challenged super-geniuses Volcanus and Magna Red, and ticking time bombs Kid Voltage and Highlighter. Though they genuinely are out to help, this octet has caused enough collateral damage that they have earned the nickname TERRORISTS IN TIGHTS!!!!
With classic super-powered action, slapstick antics, satirical,social commentary, serious science fiction,heaping plates of fan service, and just plain wrongness,Candy Coated is to the superhero genre what Reno 911 is to the police "reality" show. Part Venture Brothers part EMPOWERED!!!
I forgot to mention one of the most AWESOME elements of Candy Coated is that it is inspired by the ACTUAL PEN AND PAPER ROLE PLAYING GAMING. The game campaign is played in the Palladium Books Megaversal System known as 
The unpredictable events of game are so tightly woven into the story fabric that if it happens in the game it will happen in the comic!!!!
Here is a sneak peek at the first two pages!!
 Next is the Mysterious Sci Fi Fantasy
brought to you by the outstanding art team of Cassie Henry,,Gary Mitchell andYlenia Di Nopoli and written and created by Joseph Cain!
Something unprecidented occurred at the Graydon Hill Sanatorium and NO ONE REMEMBERS A THING ABOUT IT!!! Add a proxy war between two rival corporations looking for an artifact that could either save or destroy the galaxy and you have REQUIEM. 
As the battle rages between the shadowy Daikenkai Corporation and the dubiously benevolent Archlight Group for piece of a thousand year old artifact, Archlight decides to field a team of agents to beat their enemies to the prize.
Archlight agents, code name Athena and Balder recruit the Warwitch Zakia, the sonically powered songstress-in-hiding Violet Gale and the ingenius arms dealer Cain Kardinal, at the behest of the enigmatic Omen, to even the odds against Daikenkai's monstrous minions. 
As they approach their goal, the agents begin to recall things which reveal the true nature of  what they seek. This forces them  to question whether the artifacts are better left alone.
This is part FINAL FANTASY, part X-Files. Oh and did I mentions Space Ninjas and Dragon Elves? I could have sworn I did.....
Here is a look at the first two pages!!!
 Last, but certainly not least is the Afrofuturistic epic JUDA FIST: 7 Deaths of the Yobi!!! 
From the mind of Mark C. Dudley with an art team rounded out by ridiculously talented Ka Xiong and the unique vision of SEAGE. 

We follow Amaru Jones, a man transformed into an alien bio-weapon, who awakens 72 years in the future to a world that is far different,in some respects, than our own.  
However, the more things change the more they stay the same, as ancient conspiracies once again weave their web around Amaru threatening to rob him of any semblance of the life that he has worked so hard to build. 
Here is a look at the almost completed page one!
Part Judge Dread part Menace to Society and 30 years in the making the story finds Amaru having to choose whether to turn his back on his past, or face it head on to create a future for those that he loves.
Now let's get a little bit more into the business end of this venture!
We have added a cost breakdown for IMAGINOS PLUS, to illustrate how your pledges will be used. 
If we reach our initial goal we plan to have IMAGINOS PLUS issue 1 ready to ship by March 2014. We will be shipping the non publication prizes starting in early January 2014-March 2014.
 . If we  find ourselves in Stretch Goal territory, then things will really get interesting!!!! We will be working to get 3 extra a piece added to the 2 shortest core stories. We want the fans to be able to experience our FULL VISION for Imaginos Plus, and these extra pages will help us achieve this goal.
Depending on how well that first stretch goal goes then we have an EXTRA SPECIAL STRETCH GOAL which will involve a never before seen Palladium Books RIFTS RPG introductory comic!!!!
15 DOLLAR REWARD!!!!!
"SILENT WEAPONS FOR QUIET WARS"
2013 Imaginos Sketchbook 24 Pages Full Color
25 DOLLAR REWARD!!!!!  
Exclusive IMAGINOS PLUS 28 by 36 Limited Edition Poster
50 DOLLAR REWARD!!!!! 
Be a part of the team with your  IMAGINOS WORKSHOP STANDARD CONVENTION T-SHIRT
 100 DOLLAR REWARD !!!!! 
 Exclusive JUDA FIST AMARU TATTOO SHIRT!!!!! 
This is a limited quantity BLEACH PAINTED T-Shirt depicting the AWESOME tattoo adorning the main character in our comic JUDA FIST: 7 DEATHS OF THE YOBI!!!
 100 DOLLAR REWARD No 2!!!!!    
Exclusive IMAGINOS MASCOT T-SHIRT depicting our mascot NOS!!
  We know people have a lot of pressing things to do with their money this time of year but we, the founders of Imaginos Workshop, would like to thank you all in advance for believing in us.

I speak with them frequently and they are very excite to be a part of this.

I also want to be able to maintain momentum in our pledge community while keeping them very much involved as the project nears its completion and beyond.
